name: 魔物娘と不思議な冒険～力の宝珠と帰還の塔～
name_original: 魔物娘と不思議な冒険～力の宝珠と帰還の塔～
description:
Let's go on adventures with monstergirls!!
This game is Roguelike RPG.

■□■ Game System ■□■

This is Roguelike game.
When you move once, another monsters also moves once.
You can get monstergirls in dungion, and you can run with them.

!! The language of this game is Japanese only now !!
But I'm thinking about English language support in the future :)
